title: Two-Weapon Fighting
content:
o-Weapon Fighting Information

When you make an attack with your off-hand weapon, you can add your Ability Modifier to the damage of the attack.

How to unlock Two-Weapon Fighting

Two-Weapon Fighting can be acquired by

Fighter (Lvl 1) Ranger Lvl 2 Bard (College of Swords Lvl 3)

Two-Weapon Fighting Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here If you're looking to add this feature to your character, you can look for gloves called 'Gloves of the Balanced Hands' which gives you the Two-Weapon Fighting, or
